Kader PDIP Dewi Tanjung Adukan Novel Baswedan ke Polda Metro Jaya
06 Nov 2019, 09:54 by Taufiq Siddiq, Febriyan
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Kader PDIP Dewi Tanjung melaporkan penyidik senior Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi Novel Baswedan ke Polda Metro Jaya. Perempuan itu menuding Novel melakukan rekayasa dalam kasus penyiraman air keras ke matanya yang terjadi April 2017.
"Saya akan melaporkan penyidik KPK Novel Baswedan atas dugaan rakayasa kasus penyiraman kasus matanya," ujar Dewi saat ditemui di Polda Metro Jaya, Rabu 6 November 2019.
Dewi berpendapat kasus penyiraman air keras Novel Baswedan merupakan rekayasa. Menurut dia, terdapat banyak kejanggalan dalam kasus itu, seperti efek dari air keras yang hanya merusak bagian mata Novel. Menurut dia, dampak dari air keras seharusnya juga merusak hingga bagian pipi.
Perempuan yang juga pernah menuding Politikus Partai Amanat Nasional Amien Rais melakukan makar itu menilai ada kejanggalan dari video-video yang memperlihatkan kondisi Novel, termasuk salah satu video Novel dengan keadaan mata tidak rusak yang viral di sosial media.
Dia mengaku sudah membawa sejumlah barang bukti atas laporannya tersebut. Namun Dewi enggan menjelaskan lebih jauh.
"Ada barang bukti foto-foto, video," ujarnya.
Berita tudingan rekayasa kasus penyiraman air keras terhadap Novel Baswedan mencuat di sosial media beberapa hari lalu dari sebuah tayangan video Novel sedang duduk sambil didorong di kursi roda.
Pengunggah video itu menyertakan keterangan tertulis "Mata Novel Baswedan saat baru ditayangin di NET TV 18 april 2017..!?dia kaget dg tiba2 kemunculan wartawan NET, liat matanya dan pipi mulus pdhl baru kasus penyiraman," tulisnya.
Dari video itu, sejumlah pemilik akun media sosial di Twitter lantas menuduh adanya rekayasa dalam penyiraman air keras terhadap Novel. Akun-akun itu mencuit dengan narasi soal adanya skenario di kasus Novel Baswedan.
Novel sendiri telah menanggapi serangan kepadanya di media sosial twitter. Dia menyatakan sempat mengalami luka bakar di bagian wajahnya saat awal peristiwan penyiraman air keras itu. Namun luka tersebut pulih hanya dalam waktu 5 hari saja setelah ditangani dokter ahli di Singapura.
"Di Singapore kebetulan bagus dan Alhamdulillah atas izin Allah bisa kembali hanya sedikit sekali yang tersisa. Hanya luka permukaan. Jadi semua tumbuh sendiri yang di muka. Saya lihat ke kaca juga enggak nampak, cuma dilihat sama orang yang dampingi," kata Novel kepada Tempo, Rabu 6 November 2019.

PDIP cadre Dewi Tanjung Composes Baswedan's novel to Jakarta Jaya Regional Police
Nov 6 2019, 09:54 by Taufiq Siddiq, Febriyan
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - PDIP cadre Dewi Tanjung reported senior investigators at the Baswedan Corruption Eradication Commission to Metro Jaya Regional Police. The woman accused Novel of fabricating a case of pouring hard water into her eyes that occurred in April 2017.
"I will report the KPK investigator Novel Baswedan for allegedly fabricating a case of watering his eye case," Dewi said when met at the Jakarta Metropolitan Police, Wednesday 6 November 2019.
Dewi believes the Baswedan Novel hard watering case is fabricated. According to him, there are many irregularities in the case, such as the effect of hard water which only damages the eyes of the novel. According to him, the impact of hard water should also damage the cheeks.
The woman who also once accused the National Mandate Party Politician Amien Rais of treason was judging there were irregularities from the videos that showed the condition of the novel, including one of the video novel with a state of undamaged eyes that were viral in social media.
He claimed to have brought a number of items of evidence to the report. But Dewi was reluctant to explain further.
"There is evidence of photographs, videos," he said.
News of allegations of engineering a case of hard watering against Baswedan Novels sticking out on social media a few days ago from a video show Novel was sitting while being pushed in a wheelchair.
The video uploader included a written statement "Baswedan's novel eye when it was just aired on NET TV on April 18, 2017 ...!? He was shocked by the sudden appearance of NET reporters, looking at his eyes and cheeks smoothly in a new watering case," he wrote.
From the video, a number of social media account owners on Twitter then accused the engineered watering of the novel. The accounts tweeted with narration about the scenario in the Baswedan Novel case.
The novel itself has responded to the attack on him on Twitter social media. He claimed to have suffered burns on the face during the beginning of the shower watering hard. But the wound healed in just 5 days after being treated by a specialist in Singapore.
"In Singapore it was a good coincidence and Alhamdulillah with Allah's permission, only a very few were left. Only surface wounds. So everything grew on its own face. I saw the glass also not visible, only seen by the person being accompanied," Novel told Tempo Wednesday 6 November 2019.
